verses.verse: And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me came <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H5782>waked<s%> me, as a <S%H376>man<s%> that is <S%H5782>wakened<s%> out of his <S%H8142>sleep<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, What <S%H7200>seest<s%> thou? And I <S%H559>said<s%>, I have <S%H7200>looked<s%>, and behold a <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> all of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, with a <S%H1531>bowl<s%> upon the <S%H7218>top<s%> of it, and his <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps<s%> thereon, and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4166>pipes<s%> to the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps<s%>, which are upon the <S%H7218>top<s%> thereof:
And <S%H8147>two<s%> olive <S%H2132>trees<s%> by it, <S%H259>one<s%> upon the <S%H3225>right<s%> side of the <S%H1543>bowl<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> upon the <S%H8040>left<s%> side thereof.
So I <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>spake<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What are these, my <S%H113>lord<s%>?

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H3045>Knowest<s%> thou not what these be? And I <S%H559>said<s%>, No, my <S%H113>lord<s%>.

Then he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>spake<s%> unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Not by <S%H2428>might<s%>, nor by <S%H3581>power<s%>, but by my <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

Who art thou, O <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>? <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> thou shalt become a <S%H4334>plain<s%>: and he shall bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H68%H7222>headstone<s%> thereof with <S%H8663>shoutings<s%>, crying, <S%H2580>Grace<s%>, <S%H2580>grace<s%> unto it.
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

The <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> have laid the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of this <S%H1004>house<s%>; his <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall also <S%H1214>finish<s%> it; and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me unto you.

For who hath <S%H936>despised<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of small <S%H6996>things<s%>? for they shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>, and shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H68%H913>plummet<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> with those <S%H7651>seven<s%>; they are the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which run to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> through the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Â¶ Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> I, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, What are these <S%H8147>two<s%> olive <S%H2132>trees<s%> upon the <S%H3225>right<s%> side of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> and upon the <S%H8040>left<s%> side thereof?

And I <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H8145>again<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, What be these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H7641>branches<s%> which <S%H3027>through<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6804>pipes<s%> <S%H7324>empty<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> oil out of themselves?
And he <S%H559>answered<s%> me and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3045>Knowest<s%> thou not what these be? And I <S%H559>said<s%>, No, my <S%H113>lord<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> he, These are the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3323>anointed<s%> <S%H1121>ones<s%>, that <S%H5975>stand<s%> by the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>.
